description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f6pe","text":"2023 NUS-Singapore iGEM team followed this protocol to isolate the DNA fragments from the agarose gel after the gel electrophoresis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cj98n","text":"Prepare and label an Eppondoft tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
